shortContent:
This creature can fly. This trait always includes a number to indicate at
what speeds it moves when it flies. For more details on flying,
see Chapter VII: Playing the Game.
content:
A creature with this trait has the natural ability to fly, whether
with broad leathery wings, strange warp energies, or inflatable
gas sacs. This trait always includes a number to indicate at
what speeds it moves when it flies. For more details on flying,
see Chapter VII: Playing the Game.
